ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
python_min:
- '3.9'

about.description: **chitra** (**चित्र**) is a multi-functional library for full-stack Deep Learning. It simplifies Model Building, API development, and Model Deployment. Load Image from Internet url, filepath or `numpy` array and plot Bounding Boxes on the images easily. Model Training and Explainable AI. Easily create UI for Machine Learning models or Rest API backend that can be deployed for serving ML Models in Production. PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/chitra/](https://pypi.org/project/chitra/)
about.summary: A multi functional library for full stack Deep Learning.

about.description: **chitra** (**चित्र**) is a multi-functional library for full-stack Deep Learning. It simplifies Model Building, API development, and Model Deployment. Load Image from Internet url, filepath or `numpy` array and plot Bounding Boxes on the images easily. Model Training and Explainable AI. Easily create UI for Machine Learning models or Rest API backend that can be deployed for serving ML Models in Production. PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/chitra/](https://pypi.org/project/chitra/)
about.summary: A multi functional library for full stack Deep Learning.

name: chitra
raw_meta_yaml: {% set name = "chitra" %} {% set version = "0.2.0" %} package: name: {{ name|lower }} version: {{ version }} source: url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/chitra-{{ version }}.tar.gz sha256: f38cb1f528c629c458b5eba5311e0fa17b4160cae06b9859a6c645ff19c3f933 build: number: 2 noarch: python entry_points: - chitra = chitra.cli.main:app script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv requirements: host: - pip - python {{ python_min }} - flit-core >=2,<4 run: - python >={{ python_min }} - imgaug >=0.4.0 - matplotlib-base - pillow - typeguard - typer test: imports: - chitra - chitra.cli commands: - pip check - chitra --help requires: - pip - python {{ python_min }} about: home: https://github.com/aniketmaurya/chitra summary: A multi functional library for full stack Deep Learning. license: Apache-2.0 license_file: LICENSE description: | ## What is chitra? **chitra** (**चित्र**) is a multi-functional library for full-stack Deep Learning. It simplifies Model Building, API development, and Model Deployment. ### Components Load Image from Internet url, filepath or `numpy` array and plot Bounding Boxes on the images easily. Model Training and Explainable AI. Easily create UI for Machine Learning models or Rest API backend that can be deployed for serving ML Models in Production. PyPI: [https://pypi.org/project/chitra/](https://pypi.org/project/chitra/) doc_url: https://chitra.readthedocs.io/en/latest dev_url: https://github.com/aniketmaurya/chitra extra: recipe-maintainers: - sugatoray # Maintainer(s) from Package Repo - aniketmaurya
